author: World Health Organization
title: One Health: A Unified Approach to Health
description: One Health is an integrated, unifying approach that aims to sustainably balance and optimize the health of people, animals, and ecosystems.

author: A. K. Mishra
title: Impact of Healthcare Services on Human Health in Nepal: A Review
description: A review evaluating published articles, health services, and personal experiences across urban and rural areas in Nepal.

author: Kathmandu University
title: Kathmandu University Opens Health Informatics Affiliation
description: KU invites private colleges across Nepal to apply for affiliation in Bachelor in Health Informatics and other programs by June 24, 2025.
